li.a: How to Report Child Abuse | Cómo Reporte el abuso infantil

div.p: Hoosick Falls Elementary School serves students in grades UPK-6. If you are a parent or guardian, you can find information via this tab.
Hoosick Falls Jr. / Sr. High School serves students in grades 7-12. If you are a parent, guardian, or student, you can find information via this tab.
Community information from the Superintendent, Business Office, & Board of Education, including BOE meeting schedule & minutes.
Hoosick Falls CSD will be providing updates and information on a regular basis. The district has set up this page as an official resource for our community.

br.a: How to Report Child Abuse//Cómo Reporte el abuso infantil

ul.li: Hoosick Falls Central School District is located at 21187 NY 22 in Hoosick Falls, NY 12090
Our mailing address is PO Box 192, Hoosick Falls, NY 12090
Directions to our campus can be found HERE

div.b:
Per Governor Cuomo's Executive Order,
Hoosick Falls CSD will remain closed through Friday, May 15 and will reopen Monday, May 18.
